selectlanguage: Select the language in which you want to use the systema
supporttext: When this is set to active, the support representative will be able to access and view your data. Once you have deactivated this mode, the representative will still be able to access and view your data until the current session has expired, maximum 30 minutes from the time it was activated by the support representative.
supportselection: Choose the user you would like to support
supportconfirmation: Are you sure you want to switch to this user's account?
noaccessmodule: Content not visible because employee does not have access to this module
